events.question: Hello adventurer, have you spoke to that weird looking person at the village square yet?

events.text: Nice, now let me introduce you to this village.
Please go speak to him first!

The Javanese are the original inhabitants of Java, 
our ancestors have been on the island for thousands of years. 
We have been living in an enclosed harmonious state, 
worshipping our gods until the Hollandaise came with their magnificent ships.
Despite living in peace and tranquillity, we have not developed much in their technological advances. 
This makes use incredibly vulnerable when the Hollandaise come.

The Hollandaise are natural explorers. 
They have been to places that the Javanese have never even heard of. 
They have acquired technologies that seemed godlike to the Javanese. 
Despite arriving on Java with peaceful intentions, tensions between the Hollandaise and the Javanese simmer and build.
This is because of the forceful conversion of the Javanese religion to adhere to what the Hollandaise believed in. 
The Whites believed in the Cross that protects them throughout their voyages.

The most prized possession of the Javanese is the so-called “Java Beans”. 
These Beans emit magical energy that could rival even the most advanced technology the Hollandaise have. 
There were 7 Beans foretold by the Grand Elders of the Javanese. 
It was foretold that during a certain crisis, only by uniting the 7 Beans, could the Javanese survive.

Bean 1: Colour [color=red]red[/color]. It is the embodiment of courage in the face of great adversity. 
Bean 2: Colour [color=blue]blue[/color]. It enables the user to control the flow of water.
Bean 3: Colour [color=green]green[/color]. It represents truth among lies.
Bean 4: Colour [color=maroon]brown[/color]. It corrects sleep deprivation.
Bean 5: Colour [color=yellow]gold[/color]. It gives you wealth.
Bean 6: Colour [color=black]black[/color]. Great power flows through you.
Bean 7: Colour [color=white]unknown[/color]. It only exists in legends foretold.

You meanwhile, are the son of a mixed family between the clan of the Javanese and the Hollandaise. 
The war started long before you were born. 
Driven by the war, your parents brought you to a safe place in a nearby island of Lombok.
 Despite being born to a mixed family, you have never lost touch with your cultural heritage.
You always yearned to stop the bloody war, so in your youth, you trained in close quarter combat every day.
Now that you are prepared, let me officially welcome you to the Cult of the bean!
I shall start your ardious journey to Java by giving you the [color=red][RED][/color] bean
